9-0_training_50_0:
SELECT MIN(an.name) AS alternative_name, MIN(chn.name) AS character_name, MIN(t.title) AS movie
FROM cat_aka_name_1 AS an,
 cat_char_name_1 AS chn,
 cat_cast_info_1 AS ci,
 cat_company_name_1 AS cn,
 cat_movie_companies_1 AS mc,
 cat_name_1 AS n,
 cat_role_type_1 AS rt,
 cat_title_1 AS t
WHERE ci.movie_id = t.id
 AND t.id = mc.movie_id
 AND ci.movie_id = mc.movie_id
 AND mc.company_id = cn.id
 AND ci.role_id = rt.id
 AND n.id = ci.person_id
 AND chn.id = ci.person_role_id
 AND an.person_id = n.id
 AND an.person_id = ci.person_id
AND ci.note IN ('(presenter)', '(presenter)', '(uncredited)', '(uncredited)', '(uncredited)')
AND cn.country_code = '[us]'
AND mc.note IS NOT NULL 
AND (mc.note LIKE '%Blu%' OR mc.note LIKE '%USA%')
AND n.gender = 'm'
AND n.name LIKE '%Beau%'
AND rt.role = 'actor'
AND t.production_year BETWEEN 1967 AND 1976;
